q: President Bush 's closest advisers, saying Condoleezza Rice lacked experience and Colin Powell showed poor management skills. Asked whether he admired his ex-boss's father president George H.W. Bush - under whom he did not serve- Donald Rumsfeld replied curtly: No, I was kind of disappointed in him. Condoleezza Rice , President Bush 's national security adviser who later became secretary of state, had "never served in a George H.W. Bush administration position," a lack of experience that hampered her ability to organize critical meetings,

Cairo had raised fears that the country could suffer the same loss of cultural heritage as occurred in Iraq in 2003 after the fall of Saddam Hussein . Egypt's cultural treasures are now secure, Zahi Hawass said. The Valley of the Kings is safe, the pyramids are safe, 24 museums are safe, the synagogues and the monasteries and the Muslim monuments are completely safe, he said.

Toch zal het voor Larry Page ontzettend lastig worden om de successtrategie van Eric Schmidt komende jaren door te zetten, voorspellen kenners. Eric Schmidt heeft het geweldig gedaan en Google naar grote successen geleid , zegt Gartner-analist Ray Valdes. De altijd rustig en relaxt ogende Eric Schmidt , die eerder als ceo bij Novell en cto bij Sun Microsystems diende, werd in juli 2001 door Page en Sergey Brin benoemd als topman van het

competition to the runaway success of Apple's iPhone.
